# Visibility.hidden

**Case**

The element may be hidden.

## Declaration

```swift
case hidden
```

## Discussion

Some APIs may use this value to represent a hint or preference, rather than a mandatory assertion. For example, setting confirmation dialog title visibility to `hidden` using the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/View/confirmationDialog(_:isPresented:titleVisibility:actions:)] modifier may not always hide the dialog title, which is required on some platforms.

## Getting visibility options

- **Visibility.automatic**: The element may be visible or hidden depending on the policies of the component accepting the visibility configuration.
- **Visibility.visible**: The element may be visible.
